Click to schedule a tour. "The finest clubs, like family traditions, trace their roots to strong contributions by individuals. These individuals create the environment in which camaraderie flourishes and new friendships begin. These individuals are called Members.” LIVE THE LEGEND! For membership information, call Chief Operating Officer & Director of Membership, Tom Brun at 262-968-9717. © Copyright 2025. All rights reserved. Lely Resort Golf & Country Club Tournaments Who's who Dictionary News Tournaments Who's who Dictionary News Find a course: Americas Europe Africa/ME Asia Oceania Overview Learn more Where2Stay Lely Resort Golf & Country Club 8004 Lely Resort Blvd, Naples, Florida FL 34113 Office +1 (239) 793 2223 Email Email the course Website Visit website Academy John Jacobs Golf School About the course The Course: 54 holes. Tree-lined and open parkland. Gently undulating terrain Surroundings: Residential setting. Designer: Flamingo Island course - Robert Trent Jones (1990); Mustang course - Lee Trevino (1991); The Classics CC - Gary Player (1991). Back tees Club tees Front tees Yards 7171 6018 5377 Par 72 72 72 SSS or slope 75.1 69.6 71.7 At the same location: 18-hole par-72 Lely Mustang Golf Club course (7217 yds from back tees). Located o.4 mls from the Flamingo Island/Mustang clubhouse is the clubhouse of the members-only, 18-hole par-72 Classics course (6660 yds from back tees). Location Latitude: 26.085111 Longitude: -81.701146 How to get there: 8 miles SE of downtown Naples Americas / Naples / Ft Myers / Lely Resort Lely Resort Golf & Country Club Est. 1990 Lely Resort Golf & Country Club is home to three well-rated and always popular golf courses. The Classics by Gary Player is Lely Resort's private, member-only course with its own separate clubhouse. The Flamingo Island layout is one of the last courses designed by the legendary acrhitect Robert Trent Jones Sr. The Mustang by Lee Trevino is designed as a generally forgiving layout, although 12 lakes and extensive bunkering will need to be navigated around during your round. These open parkland layouts should not disappoint, with many attractive features and several excellent holes to enjoy. Plenty of golfing challenge, well-crafted designs and usually good upkeep all contribute to the appeal of these courses. Well worth including on your play list if you are in the area. Stay&Play at Lely Resort: luxury onsite accommodation available, see Where2Stay section below. List of courses: Florida - South West Map of courses: Florida - South West Visitors Who can play and when? Visitors welcome on weekdays and weekends on the Flamingo Island and Mustang courses. Must book in advance. Green fees Contact club for golf rates. Other information Golf carts are fitted with GPS. Practice facilities Excellent Did you know? The Flamingo Island course at Lely Resort is one of the last golf courses to be designed by Robert Trent Jones Sr. Where2Stay GreenLinks Golf Villas at Lely Resort 7990 Mahogany Run Lane, Naples, FL 34113 +1 (239) 732 9920 Visit website Located alongside Lely Resort's two public-access courses (Flamingo Island and Mustang), the GreenLinks Golf Villas offer one, two and three bedroom rental units, putting you in the centre of a great golfing location, with easy access to several of the area's best courses. Golf at this hotel: Lely Resort (Flamingo Island Club and Mustang Golf Club) Golf within 5 miles: Golf within 20 miles: Naples Grande Resort & Club 5-star 475 Seagate Drive, Naples, FL 34103 +1 (239) 597 3232 Visit website Now a member of the Hilton family and The Waldorf Astoria Collection, the Naples Grande Resort & Club is a quiet oasis located amongst the lush palms, mangroves and balmy breezes of Naples, Florida. The recently refurbished 18-story tower features 395 guest rooms and 29 suites, with views out onto the Gulf of Mexico. Guest facilities at this top-quality resort include an 18-hole Rees Jones designed golf course (located just 5 miles away), 15 Har-Tru tennis courts, three swimming pools, Golden Door Spa, fully equipped fitness centre, a wide range of water sports, three miles of white sand beach, excellent meeting and conference facilities and wonderfully varied dining options. Golf at this hotel: No Golf within 5 miles: Naples Grande; Naples Beach; Tiburon Golf within 20 miles: Valencia; Lely Resort; Rookery at Marco; Hammock Bay; Old Corkscrew. Find a course By country/region AMERICAS EUROPE AFRICA/ME ASIA OCEANIA By city AMERICAS EUROPE AFRICA/ME ASIA OCEANIA Or Search by maps Tournaments Women’s (British) Open : the last women’s major championship of the season is hosted by Royal Porthcawl GC . It’s the first time this fabulous seaside links course has hosted the event (July 31-Aug 3). Walker Cup : the 50th playing of this prestigious men’s amateur event sees the GB&I go head-to-head against the defending USA team at Cypress Point Club , California (Sept 6-7). After that, all eyes turn to Bethpage State Park on Long Island, NY , where the American and defending European professional teams engage in the 45th Ryder Cup (Sept 27-29). Who's Who Lottie Woad : 21-year-old Woad burst onto the professional scene in July, with wins in the Women’s Irish Open (as an amateur) and three weeks later in the Women’s Scottish Open (as a professional). She nearly picked-up a major championship, placing third in The Evian in the same month. Pádraig Harrington : the ever-likeable Irishman added the (British) Senior Open Championship title to his stellar array of tournament successes. His win came on Sunningdale’s spectacular Old Course. Harrington had already bagged the U.S. Senior Open title in June this year. The Dutch GC, The Netherlands The Dutch : "It's no' just a game", as they say in Scotland, and that's certainly true at The Dutch. With 5-star services throughout, a lavishly comfortable Loch Lomond -inspired clubhouse, and a superbly designed and presented golf course, one could not ask for more from this top-end private club. Join us at The Dutch from August 21–24 for the Festival of Golf, featuring the HotelPlanner Tour . Experience four days of top-tier sport, live music, incredible food, and unexpected surprises. Explore the grounds, connect with others, embrace new challenges, and dive into an unforgettable celebration. Click here to buy tickets . Prince's Golf Club, Kent (UK) Here at Prince’s Golf Club you'll find 27 excellent holes of links golf. Just over the fence and sharing similar terrain is Royal St George’s; but Prince’s is far from overshadowed by its venerable neighbour. The three nine-hole loops at Prince's, laid out over gently undulating terrain, are sure to bring a smile of satisfaction to all lovers of links golf. Stay&Play at Prince's : excellent onsite Lodge accommodation available Popular videos You can subscribe to the Where2Golf channel on YT if you like to see more video content. You'll find a "Subscribe" button on any of our YouTube videos. Or if you want a quick and direct access subscribe here . Once done, any new published videos will show up in your Subscriptions feed. Bethpage State Park (New York) host of the Ryder Cup 2025 Whistling Straits (Wisconsin, US) TPC Louisiana host of the Zurich Classic of New Orleans To receive updates on golf courses and destinations uncovered sign up for our monthly newsletter. Golf Tournaments & Outings | The Classics Country Club Skip to Content Menu Golf The Mustang The Flamingo Island The Classics Club Life Membership Club Amenities Wedding & Events Tournaments Contact Us Member Login Call Tournaments Professionally Managed Golf Tournaments & Outings Whether you’re planning a corporate outing, charity fundraiser, or just an enjoyable day of golf with friends on one of our awe-inspiring golf courses, we pride ourselves on delivering flawlessly executed golf tournaments and outings that exceed your expectations at every turn. Our award-winning golf courses and superb clubhouse amenities make Lely Resort Golf & Country Club a memorable locale for golf and socializing, while our friendly, attentive service, delectable on-site catering and professional staff allow you to relax and enjoy the event while we take care of all the details. Contact Our Team What We Can Do To Help Lely Resort Golf & Country Club’s experience hosting major golf tournaments and outings for groups ranging from large corporations and local businesses to community groups and non-profits makes us uniquely qualified to make your next golf event an unqualified success. The following are just some of the value-added services included in our tournament packages, which set us apart: Groups up to 144+ golfers Two championship courses Expert consulting services On-course setup & breakdown Tournament availability 7 days a week Lithium-Ion power Golf Carts Curbside bag drop Full practice facilities Registration setup GPS system with Live Leaderboard scoring Banquet facilities & catering Full practice and driving range privileges Custom signage & scorecards On-course beverage cart Pre and post-event space Equipment rentals for both men and women Full service on-site restaurant Custom merchandise & special ordering options Plan Your Tournament Marc Canady Facilitator of Golf Sales Call (239) 793-2600 Email [email protected] Contact Marc About Me Contact Our Team Schedule a Tour of Lely Resort Golf & Country Club Ready for a tour of our facilities? Lely Resort - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Naples Golf Communities Lely Resort Lely Resort in Naples, Florida is home to three beautiful golf courses. Flamingo Island is an intriguing public course and the only Robert Trent Jones Sr. design in the area. Also a public course, the Mustang is a challenging Lee Trevino design, also the only one around. Lely is located on the Southeast side of Naples, and it is home to the Edison College Naples Campus. The third course, The Classics, is surrounded by beautiful subtropical woodlands. This 18-hole championship course features tree-lined fairways and gentle contours. Less formal than the other two courses, the natural setting of The Classics is as serene and peaceful. Gary Player designed this masterpiece to be the epitome of a club player’s golf course. It requires planning and strategy backed up by the solid golf skills that characterize a true club player. In addition to golf, homeowners have access to world-class amenities at the Players Club & Spa. Also, a 30,000 square foot clubhouse with multiple dining options from casual to formal. Additionally, members seeking outdoor activities will enjoy a large lagoon pool with a waterfall, 13 Har-Tru Tennis Courts, 4 Bocce Ball Courts and 2 Pickleball Courts. For those interested in wellness, there is a 6,000 square foot fitness center and spa offering a wide array of services. Finally, for those who are dog lovers, this is one of the very few communities with its very own dog park! If you are looking for the ultimate resort lifestyle, Lely is hard to beat.
